text:
Amazon Alexa AI | Software Engineers, Software Development Manager | Seattle, WA | Full-Time | Onsite

We are building the services behind Alexa's dialogue management, conversational AI, and other similar capabilities that make it possible for Alexa to have a conversation with customers. We leverage machine learning, working closely with ML scientists and experts in natural language understanding.

Our languages used are mainly Java and Python.

Apply here: (SDE) https://www.amazon.jobs/en/jobs/768073/software-development-..., (SDM) https://www.amazon.jobs/en/jobs/719966/software-development-...

I've been with Alexa for almost 4 years building out conversational and natural language capabilities and I'd be happy to answer any questions you have here or at diamondbishop at gmail or diamondbishop on twitter.

-Diamond, engineering leader of the Alexa AI Dialogue Systems Engineering group.
